alert.note: Alert for Lower Clark Fork Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 19 at 7:48AM MST until November 19 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing Rain. Trace to 0.05 inches. * WHERE...Bitterroot Valley, Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, I-90 Lookout Pass to Haugan, Evaro Hill, Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, Missoula, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains, and I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth * WHEN...Until 10 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of freezing rain will cause icy spots until around 10 am this morning, causing rapidly changing travel conditions. Watch out for black ice.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Clark Fork Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region
